headline: Why The Narrative Around General Dynamics Is Shifting After Analyst Upgrades And Defense Demand
summary: General Dynamics' stock narrative is shifting as analysts anchor updated price targets around an unchanged fair value near $381 per share, even as the discount rate nudges higher to about 7.75% on modestly higher perceived risk. With revenue growth expectations holding near 3.76%, the market debate now centers on whether stronger defense demand and marine backlog visibility are enough to justify the richer target range. Read on to see what is driving this evolving story and how you can stay...
